questions.question: What is the primary color of the bottle's label, excluding any text or logos?
What specific vitamin is prominently displayed on the bottle's label?
What is the dosage of the vitamin indicated on the bottle's label, in mcg?
What shape best describes the overall form of the supplement container?
What material appears to constitute the primary container of the supplement?
What is the predominant color of the text on the bottle's main label?
What is the visible text indicating the type of product displayed?
What is the brand name visible on the label of the product?
What is the number of tablets mentioned on the label?
What is the texture of the bottle's label; is it smooth or rough to the touch (visually assessed)?
What design element is present at the top of the bottle?
What is the color of the small text at the very bottom of the label?
What is the color of the seal on the bottle cap?
What health benefit is explicitly mentioned on the label, concerning bones?
Is the tamper-evident seal intact on the bottle?
